channel.title: Looking for a partner (Ican host on vps)
channel.description:
Hey Moparscape users, today I bought a 2Gb RAM vps and was hoping to partner up with someone on a 317 rsps server eco/pk based, would be open to a full pk aswell. My skype is "thefatman101".
Reply on this thread if you're interested and also PM or add my skype.
Looking forward to hearing from you :)
NOTE: Mods please move this to proper area, I was unsure of where to post this :) sorry,
-Circuit

item.title: Looking for a partner (Ican host on vps)
item.dc:creator: @gitds gitds
item.description:
@gitds wrote:

I have source/client with an ex server thathad 70+ online all times.all the players are asking me to come back with the server.but i dont have a vps so thats impossible. I dont want any payment to be the coder. I just want to administrAte a server again…

My email – moparstrenght@hotmail.com

My server name – turmoil

Lucas.
